subject: Tests and Testing
Football
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Vikings stars Kevin Williams and Pat Williams are being improperly singled out for extra testing for steroids, their lawyer says. Peter Ginsberg, the lawyer, said he filed papers in Hennepin (Minn.) County District Court asking Judge Gary Larson to say the N.F.L. cannot treat the Williamses differently from other players while the court battle over their suspensions continues. Ginsberg said the players are being tested at least three times a month, in excess of what the testing policies allow.
